text.section:
An owner or lessee of a beauty salon may not knowingly:
employ in the beauty salon an individual with an infectious or contagious disease that presents a hazard to a patron; or
after discovering an individual has an infectious or contagious disease that presents a hazard to a patron, continue to employ the individual in the beauty salon.

section.section: An individual who knows that the individual has an infectious or contagious disease that presents a hazard to a beauty salon patron may not practice cosmetology.
An individual who knows that another individual has an infectious or contagious disease that presents a hazard to a beauty salon patron may not practice cosmetology on that other individual.

text.section:
An individual may not practice cosmetology in a careless or negligent manner so as to:
cause an infection; or
impart an infectious or contagious disease that presents a hazard to a beauty salon patron.
